name: CNN
text:
Splash Mountain, a popular ride at Walt Disney World and Disneyland, is based on the 1946 film "Song of the South," long criticized for using racist stereotypes.

Fans want to keep the ride, but they're asking Disney to scrap all mention of the movie. https://t.co/ZDiqyMh2Kj

name: CNN
text: Bats have caught a bad rap. But experts say these flying mammals have a crucial role in our ecosystem. https://t.co/4my8xyZO2N
